function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"In-person gatherings for learning sessions and webinars can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission among employees.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases and increased risk of infection among employees and leaders.","Mitigation":"Shift to virtual learning platforms for training and webinars, implement strict hygiene and distancing protocols for in-person sessions.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, webinar software, health and safety tracking technologies.","People":"Employees, leaders, and participants in learning sessions.","Owner":"Human Resources Team, Talent & Culture Team, and leadership."},{"Description":"Staff turnover reduction and engagement initiatives may lead to complacency in following health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Lack of vigilance in adhering to health and safety guidelines, leading to increased risk of contagion.","Mitigation":"Continuously reinforce the importance of health and safety measures, provide regular training and updates on disease prevention, and encourage employee accountability.","Technologies":"Health and safety communication platforms, training modules on disease prevention, employee engagement apps for reminders and updates.","People":"Employees and leaders.","Owner":"Human Resources Team and leadership."},{"Description":"Travel initiatives, such as sending employees back to their own country, may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper health and safety measures are not implemented during travel.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission during travel, potential exposure of employees to different health environments.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for travel, provide necessary protective equipment, and enforce quarantine measures upon return.","Technologies":"Health and travel tracking technologies, travel risk management software, virtual health consultations for returning employees.","People":"Employees traveling back to their own country.","Owner":"Human Resources Team, Travel Management Team."}]}
